transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Join kar liya na aapne?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan, boliye.

Customer: Join kijiye sir, join kijiye.

Executive: Kar liya na?

Customer: Haan, join kijiye.

Customer: Kar diya?

Executive: Haan, main toh join hi kar liya.

Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai sir, main aapni meri na screen dekh paoge.

Executive: Theek hai na?

Executive: Meri aap screen dekh paoge, main aapko dikha raha hu kahan pe dikhna hai.

Executive: Meri meri screen aapko show ho gayi?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Ye dekh rahe hain aap?

Customer: Mere ispe dikh hi nahi raha toh.

Executive: Sir, aapke aapke yahan flex printing machine ki abhi relevance lead aayi thi.

Customer: Are lekin mere login mein dikha ke de do na.

Executive: Achha, aap apne wala apne wala open karna?

Executive: Ah, apne wala open kijiye, apni screen mujhe share kijiye.

Customer: Kis mein share du?

Executive: Ah, share kijiye teesre number wala ye jahan se ah ek minute ye ye ye ye ye dikh raha hai aapko yahan se yahan se aap apni screen share kar sakte ho mujhe.

Executive: Ye wala ye wala jo video video ke samne wala button hai yahan se aap apni screen share kar sakte ho mujhe. Aap mujhe dekh pa rahe honge.

Executive: Is wale button se.

Customer: Konse wale ye wale?

Executive: Haan, ye wala.

Executive: Meri screen dekhiye aap phir ye wala button aap press kijiye apne apni screen mein. Jahan se aap video mute kar rahe hain aap.

Executive: Aapki aapki screen mujhe show ho jayegi.

Customer: Haan, ho gaya, ho gaya.

Executive: Haan, kholiye kholiye sir apna panel kholiye jise aap use karte hain.

Executive: Theek hai?

Customer: Haan, abhi dekho.

Executive: Abhi sir isme aap apna number daliye.

Customer: Kis mein?

Executive: Isme sir ye ye ye wala ye.

Executive: Login kijiye.

Executive: Aapke aapke number pe OTP aaya hoga aur sir IndiaMART kabhi bhi aapse OTP nahi mangta hai agar aapse koi OTP mangta hai toh kabhi kisi ko OTP mat dena. Aap khud hi OTP matlab submit karna.

Executive: Theek hai sir?

Executive: Sir ye haan theek hai. Sign in kariye.

Executive: Allow.

Executive: Ho gaya sir?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Buyleads mein jaiye sir yahan pe yahan pe.

Executive: Idhar sir idhar ah ah ye jo aapke left hand mein hai. Left hand idhar idhar sir jahan dashboard dikh raha hai. Ah ah idhar haan niche buyleads. Click kijiye ispe. Sir ye raha flex printing ah services ye rahi na sir related ye rahi na sir buyleads.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Haan toh sir ye boliye sir proper use kijiye sir isko tabhi toh ho payega yahan se aap contact buy now pe jaake aap inse baat chit kar sakte hain. Ye ye aap dekho na ye ye aata hai pehle aaya tha ye you record this ye 11 10 isse kya hoga sir?

Executive: Sir aap apna flow toh sir woh toh theek hai sir abhi toh theek hai sir main main main aapki main aapki baat samajh raha hu lekin aap ab yahan se filter bhi add kar sakte ho. Aap filter use kijiye aap aap filter use kijiye.

Executive: Hello. Filter kya use karna hai mujhe bolo?

Executive: Ah upar jaiye thoda aur upar kariye. Yahan pe aap aap aap kahan pe Maharashtra mein deal karte hain na?

Customer: Ji? Haan Maharashtra.

Executive: Keval Maharashtra mein ki ki ke aur ke aap all over India deal karte hain ye bataiye pehle. Nahi aapko keval Maharashtra bahar nahi.

Executive: Haan toh aap keval yahan pe Maharashtra wala rakhiye aur aap aap yahan pe lead type lead type search kijiye. Isme isme aap apni ye ispe click kijiye niche lead type pe. Upar upar upar sir ye wala order value ke order order value aapko 10000 se jyada ki chahiye kitni chahiye woh aap yahan se dal sakte hain. Haan toh yahan pe business type GST bulk and ye teeno teeno aap woh mark kar dijiye. Theek hai? Ab yahan pe aap dekh pa rahe hain save filter aap apni category choose kar lijiye aapko kis mein lead dekhni hai. Hello? Save save kahan pe mil raha hai? Save filter save filter yahan pe ye jo niche thoda side mein left hand side left hand upar kijiye upar ye save filter. Save filter. Theek hai? Haan okay. Iska naam iska naam aap kuch dal sakte hain kuch bhi. Theek hai sir? Haan save kar dijiye isko. Theek hai? Abhi ye aapka filter save ho gaya hai ab yahan aap category pe jaiye category pe. Category kahan pe? Ye ye raha ye niche. Hello? Ye raha. Haan. Jaiye ispe. All construction pe gaye? Haan. Agar ab aapko na wohi leads dikhai dengi sir jo jinki
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to see leads in login.

- Wants to know how to use filters.



Resolution:

- Executive guided customer on screen sharing.

- Executive explained how to apply filters.

- Executive explained how to save filters.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, screen sharing, login
